config.desc:
Create configuration file
Usage: repoman config

delete.desc:
Delete local repositories
Usage: repoman [-c/--config-file <configFile>] delete

init.desc:
Initialise non-Repoman local repositories
Usage: repoman [-c/--config-file <configFile>] init

get.desc:
Update local repositories with changes from remote repositories
Usage: repoman [-c/--config-file <configFile>] get

changes.desc:
Display the changes in local repositories
Usage: repoman [-c/--config-file <configFile>] changes

save.desc:
Update remote repositories with changes from local repositories
Usage: repoman [-c/--config-file <configFile>] save

undo.desc:
Remove uncommitted changes from local repositories
Usage: repoman [-c/--config-file <configFile>] undo

exec.desc:
Execute custom command against local repositories
Usage: repoman [-c/--config-file <configFile>] exec

clean.desc:
Delete non-Repoman local repositories
Usage: repoman [-c/--config-file <configFile>] clean
